text: Kung Fu Hustle is a 2004 Hong Kong action comedy movie. It was directed, co- written and co-produced by Stephen Chow, who also stars in the lead role. The other producers were Chui Po-chu and Jeffrey Lau, and the screenplay was co- written with Huo Xin, Chan Man-keung, and Tsang Kan-cheung. Yuen Wah, Yuen Qiu, Danny Chan, Eva Huang and Bruce Leung co-starred in prominent roles. ==Plot== A failed member of Axe Gang wants to make big in crime world but consequences force him to go on right path ==Cast== * Stephen Chow * Bruce Leung * Danny Chan * Yuen Wah * Yuen Qiu * Eva Huang ==References== Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2004 action movies Category:Hong Kong movies
title: Kung Fu Hustle
